Title: Object: An Egyptian fair at Kafr Radoin
Series: Views in Egypt, Palestine and other parts of the Ottoman Empire
Description: Plate 39 in volume I: a man with a turban on horseback in the centre, holding a festooned spear, following a group of camels which carry loads; men in the right foreground watching them, two talking with women under a tent; behind, a group of women and their camels resting under palm trees; the group crossing a field on a peninsula in the left background; after Mayer; published state. 1802 Hand-coloured aquatint with etching
Bibliographic references: Abbey Travel / Travel in Aquatint and lithography 1770-1860 from the library of J.R.Abbey (369.I.39)
